content: I laughed to see the title of the article first of how someone can give the whole idea to make $425 Million, but after reading the whole article, I found it interesting especially “Filling out the Vacuum” logic described. Well, for JIRA, I would say the same as Ben Rometsch said that it was for enterprises and yes, I always use Trello for both tracking my tasks and making a general checklist for my articles and all.
